verses.content: Juda lal Josia naupa Jehoia- kim rorêl ṭantir lai chun LALPA kuoma inthawkin hi thu hi Jeremia kuomah a hung tlung a,
“LALPA chun ka kuoma chun hieng hin a tih: Rîngkawlhai le a hnamhai i ta dingin siem la, i rînga chun bât rawh;
Edom lal dâm, Moab lal dâm, Ammon thlahai lal dâm, Tura lal dâm, Zidon lal dâm kuoma chun Juda lal Zedekia kuoma Jerusalema hunghai thangkohai kuta chun inphur rawh;
an hotuhai kuoma chun thuneina pe la, hienghin ti rawh, ‘Israel Pathien LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: In hotuhai kuoma chun hieng ang hin hril in tih:
ka bân phar le ka thilthawtheina nasatak chun hnuoi phêk chunga ramsahai le mihriem le leihnuoi chu ka siem a; chun, ka ngaia pêk ding âwm kuoma chun ka pêk tah a.
Tuhin chuong ramhai po po chu ka siehlaw Nebukadnezzar, Babulon lal kuoma chun ka pêk tah a nih, ramhnuoia ramsahai khawm chu ama rawng bâwl dingin ka pêk a nih.

Chuongchun, ama ram ngei a ni hun a tlung hmakhat chun, hnamhai chun ama le a naupasal le, a naupasal naupa rawng chu bâwl an tih; chuongchun, hnam tamtakhai le lal ropuitakhai chun ama chu suokin man an tih.

Chun, hnam le lalram Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar rawng bâwl lohai le, Babulon lal rîngkawl hnuoia an rîng sie nuom lohai chu, LALPA chun a tih; ama kut ngeia ka sukbohmang vawng hmakhat chun, anni chu hripui dâm, ṭâm dâm, kâwlhnâm dâmin hrem ka tih.
Nisienlakhawm, nangni chung- thu ruoka chun, in zâwlneihai, in khawhri zâwlhai, in manghai, in dawithiemhai, in aisân thiemhai “Babulon lal rawng chu bâwl naw ti niu,” tituhai chu ngai naw ro;
in rama inthawka hlataka sawnhmang ding cheuin anni chun khêlthu an hril cheu a ni sih a; nangni chu ka hnawt suok cheu a, in bo- hmangna dingin.
Amiruokchu, Babulon lal rîng- kawl hnuoia an rîng dawh a, ama rawngbâwltuhai chu hnam ngei chu an rama chun inumtir zing ka tih, LALPA chun a tih; inlêt an ta, chêng zing an tih,’” tiin.
Chun, hieng thuhai ang tak hin Juda lal Zedekia kuoma chun thu ka hril a, “Babulon lal rîngkawl hnuoia chun in rînghai hung daw unla, ama le a mihai rawng chu bâwl unla, hringin um ro.
Babulon lal rawng bâwl lo ding hnam chungthua LALPAIN a lo hril ta angin, ieng dingin am nang le i mihai chu hripui dâmin, ṭâmin le kawlhnâma dâm chun thîng in ta?
In kuoma ‘Babulon lal rawng chu in bâwl ding a ni nawh,’ titu zâwlneihai thu chu ngai naw ro: in kuoma chun thukhêl an hril sih a.

LALPA chun a tih: Anni chu ka tir si nawh a, nisienlakhawm, ka hmingin thukhêl chu an hril a nih; nangni chu ka hnawt suok theina ding cheu le, nangni le zâwlnei in kuoma thuhriltuhai chu in bohmang theina dingin,” tiin.

Thiempuhai le hi hnam po pohai kuoma chun hieng hin ka hril bawk a, “LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: In kuomah, ‘Ngai ta u, LALPA bûr le bêlhai chu Babulona inthawkin sâwt- nawtêa hung lâk nîng an tih,’ titu in zâwlneihai thu chu ngai naw ro; in kuomah thukhêl an hril a ni sih a.
Anni thu chu ngai naw unla, Babulon lal rawng chu bâwl unla, damin um ro, ieng dingin am hi khawpui hi râusanin um el a ta?

Amiruokchu, zâwlnei an nia, an kuoma chun LALPA thu chu a um chun, tuhin sipaihai LALPA kuoma chun hnina siem hai sienla, LALPA ina bûr le bêl mâksana la umhai le, Jerusalem le lal ina mâksana la umhai chu Babulona a fe ve nawna dingin.
Sipaihai LALPA chun sûtpuihai chungthua le, châwtawl lien chung- thua le, ân ṭhutna chungthua le, khawpuia bûr le bêl mâksana la umhai chungthua chun, hieng hin a tih:

chuong Babulon lal Nebukad- nezzarin Juda lal Jehoiakim naupa Jekonia chu sala Jerusalema in- thawka Babulona Jerusalem le Juda rama mi ṭhahai po po chu sala a ṭhuoi laia a lâk sa ve nawhai chung- thu chu;
anih, sipaihai LALPA, Israel Pathien chun hieng hin a tih: LALPA ina bûr le bêl mâksana la umhai chungthua, Juda ram lal ina le Jerusalema mihai le chun sipaihai LALPA chun hieng hin a tih:
Babulona chun phur hmang nîng an ta, chutaka chun um an tih, anni ka va sir ni chen chun, LALPA chun a tih: chun, hung la nâwk tâwl ka ta, hi hmuna hin sie nâwk ka tih,” tiin.
